wiki.content:
"Listen to Your Heart" peaked at #1 on the U.S. Billboard Hot 100 in the Autumn of 1989.
        
User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
wiki.summary: "Listen to Your Heart" peaked at #1 on the U.S. Billboard Hot 100 in the Autumn of 1989.

track.name: Listen to Your Heart
comments: I listened.............. it went something like this............"thu-dump"........ If we all followed our hearts, would the world be a better place? Less tormented perhaps? More peaceful.....
it's just too beautiful. i'm in love with this song :(
these two had a couple of hits in the mid eighties then fell off the planet...............
Listen to Your Fart!<--- Epic, Really EPIC!
ROOOD dude below!!! LOL...................... hmmm...........if I listened to my heart I know just where I would be right now............ not here!
they wasn´t my alltime favourite - but always easy listening...not my hot music style et al
my heart sounds like this song
This is interesting...sounds like 'Don't You Want Me Baby' by the Human League but that's because it is. Sort it out guys!
Great song <3 Perfect when you're on a car listening to this and it rains...
